guidelines: Always use mobile-first responsive design approach
Maintain consistent spacing using the defined scale
Ensure proper contrast ratios for accessibility
Use semantic colors for meaningful categorization
Apply consistent border radius and shadows
Implement smooth transitions for interactive elements
Test across all breakpoints and themes
Optimize for touch interactions on mobile devices
Implement proper form validation and error handling
Use consistent loading states and feedback
Ensure all interactive elements meet touch target requirements
Apply progressive enhancement for complex interactions

structure.labeling: Always provide clear, descriptive labels above form controls

responsiveDesign.typography: Use fluid font sizing: 0.875rem mobile scaling to 1rem desktop

accessibility.labeling: Use proper label elements associated with form controls

accessibility.keyboard: Ensure tab order and Enter/Space key functionality
accessibility.screenReader: Include descriptive text for complex form interactions
